comments.body:
you're missing here very important part for type checking -> annotation for type safe children. Please add ```ts interface Options { i18n: i18n t: TranslationFunction } interface i18nProps { // ... children: (t: TranslationFunction, options: Options) => JSX.Element } ``` this will make TS infer children function, so consumer will get all intellisense and type checking without the need to explicitly annotate child function. then simplify test component as well: ```ts ( t, {i18n} ) => (

{t('keyFromDefault')}

{t('anotherNamespace:key.from.another.namespace', {/* options t options */})}

) ``` thx, would love to get this PR in so don't have to override types in every project :)
Thanks for your additions, have added/adapted the type definitions accordingly
